Alert.TipText: Your device is running low on available disk space. There is currently {0}% free.
Your managed virtual machine is nearing its lease expiration. Contact your administrator for more information.
A virtual machine has completed downloading from the Synchronizer. Click here to switch to the Citrix Receiver for XenClient.

Alert.TipTitle: Restart your computer to finish installing important updates
Alert.TipText: This virtual desktop needs to be restarted for Synchronizer updates to be applied. Make sure to save your files before restarting.
To apply this update, you must restart your physical computer. Make sure to save your files before restarting.
VM "{0}" is requesting your attention. To switch focus to VM "{0}", press CTRL+{1}.
VM "{0}" in slot {1} is requesting your attention. To switch focus to VM "{0}", use the UIVM.
